arts.ttl: Matchday 27 begins with Fiorentina vs. Lecce
arts.sum: Fiorentina won the reverse fixture with Lecce in October (6-0) and could complete a Serie A double over the Giallorossi for only the second time, after the 2005/06 season – that is also the only occasion in which the Viola have won two games in a row against the Giallorossi in the competition. Lecce are the only team that have not scored a single goal in Serie A in February; they could fail to find the net in four straight league matches for the first time since last September/October under Luca Gotti.

Fiorentina are coming off a terrible second half and a late 1-0 defeat to Verona on Sunday, which extended their losing streak to three matches. Lecce have also been winless in their last three games...
